docs.snippet: UNITED NATIONS, N. Y., April 20 -- The Social Committee of the Economic and Social Council approved today a resolution recommending that the 1926 League of Nations convention on slavery be transferred to the United Nations. The vote was 16 to 0, with...
docs.lead_paragraph: UNITED NATIONS, N. Y., April 20 -- The Social Committee of the Economic and Social Council approved today a resolution recommending that the 1926 League of Nations convention on slavery be transferred to the United Nations. The vote was 16 to 0, with Poland and the Soviet Union abstaining.

headline.main: SLAVERY STEP URGED BY U. N. SOCIAL BODY

docs.snippet: The outstanding draft indebtedness of Brazil rose an additional $3,100,000 last month to a new peak of $205,100,000, the Federal Reserve Bank of New York reported yesterday. The data are based on reports supplied by fifteen banks which participate in...
docs.lead_paragraph: The outstanding draft indebtedness of Brazil rose an additional $3,100,000 last month to a new peak of $205,100,000, the Federal Reserve Bank of New York reported yesterday. The data are based on reports supplied by fifteen banks which participate in the Federal Reserve's monthly survey of Latin American export credit.

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, May 4(UP) -- Secretary of the Treasury George M. Humphrey said today that the Government would impose an extra duty on wool tops imported from Uruguay. The amount and other details will be announced in a few days.
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, May 4(UP) -- Secretary of the Treasury George M. Humphrey said today that the Government would impose an extra duty on wool tops imported from Uruguay. The amount and other details will be announced in a few days.
